lines.text: What did he ask you to do?
Ask? He didn't 'ask' me to do anything. He's the king.
How did you win the Pulitzer, with photo take-outs of PTA meetings? A harem, is a harem, is a...
Euphemism! The concept is vulgar, odious and repulsive
Ericson, you'd find something vulgar, odious and repulsive in fifth-graders playing spin the bottle
Would you please leave my personal life out of this
I didn't know you had one
Oh, I don't have to take this
But you will take this assignment

[stands up and laughs mockingly]
I will not
Now you... yeah, alright. OK. Scram.
Ericson on a harem story... I must have rocks in my head. It's a job for a woman
Just what did you mean by that?
Nothing, baby. If the slipper fits, drink out of it! Send in Peggy Benson

[looking at bench]
Rimsky, in for Korsakoff!
